type: Legendary Creature – Human Nomad Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike
[i]Prevailing Winds[/i] – Whenever you attack with five or more creatures, untap each creature you control, then draw two cards.
[i]Mani Katti[/i] – Creatures your opponents control lose flying and can't gain flying.
[i]Crit [/i]– Whenever Lyndis, Blade Queen deals combat damage to a player, create a copy of target creature you control, except it isn't legendary if that creature is legendary.
